changelog:
ROM Side Changelog till todays date :
- January Security Patch: Android-9.0.0_r30 (PQ1A.190105.004)
- Syberia: Bump to v2.2
- Settings: Notification log
- SyberiaSettings: Running services icon toggle
- SyberiaSettings: Edit Icon Toggle
- Camera: Increase launch speed
- Dialer: Show phone number on bottom if number is present
- SystemUI: Update bluetooth battery icon
- Navbar: fix swipe to back glitches
- Fix NPE when creates wifi tracker
- Black theme fixes
- Fixed issue with AppOps service
- Fixed traffic indicator not hiding on lost connection
- Add support for the .opus file format
- SyberiaSettings: Custom Rounded Corner and Padding preferences
- Launcher3: Add Google search double tap option
- Settings: Add new 20SEVEN font
- SmartNav: update smartbar home drawable
- Fix Signature Spoofing (MicroG)
- Fix no default ringtone for slot2
- Fix volume panel animation
- Fix an issue where unlocking the SIM PIN failed
- Fix Miracast sound
- OP gestures tweaks
- Improvements for render engine
- Add animations to QS tiles
- Add interpolators to QS tile animations   
- Extended audio panel 
- Audio panel location
- Three-fingers-swipe to screenshot
- Update translations
- Fix full nav gestures
-  Full Substratum support (service)
   !!!Be very careful as many themes are not fully compatible with Android Pie. 
   You can get big problems if you apply a layer for SystemUI!!!
-  Lockscreen clock&date font style and size 
- Fix Traffic monitor tint on dark QS
- CAF Boost Framework
- Game detection logic
- Use correct icon for ring volume
- Fix the legacy color icons

Device Side Changelogs:
- Switched back to HMP
- Bumped to 4.4.170 and merged latest CAF tags
- GPS blobs from daisy
- Replaced Marlin's Perf stack with Daisy's
- Added and enabled CAF's BoostFramework (From Daisy)
- HD icon removed (thanks to @devabhi)
- Adjusted thermal thresholds of sultans's thermal driver (Less Aggresive)
- Added Adreno Idler in the kernel
- Stock Cam is now working fine
- Marlin brightness configs
- ETC
